response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. Considering this, I would like to propose a special introductory offer of $12,000 for you to experience the benefits firsthand. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.", "product_price": 12000}
